job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: <p>W2 Only - NO C2C</p><p><br></p><p>This lead <strong><u>Site Reliability Engineer</u></strong> (SRE) position will design and provision infrastructure such as RedHat OpenShift and Google Cloud Platform GKE supporting cloud native applications alongside a geographically distributed team.</p><p><br></p><ul><li>(3+ years) Strong Linux knowledge (i.e. RHEL, Ubuntu, SUSE).&nbsp;</li><li>(1+ years) Experience in use of Kubernetes.&nbsp;</li><li>(1+ years) Experience in use of container technologies.&nbsp;</li><li>(3+ years) In-depth use of Cloud-based PaaS and IaaS. GCP and Azure experience preferred.&nbsp;</li><li>(2+ years) Experience with GIT and CI/CD pipelines using Concourse and/or Jenkins.&nbsp;</li><li>Experience using PaaS solutions such as Cloud Foundry.&nbsp;</li><li>Demonstrable proficiency in at least one programming or scripting language. Go and/or Bourne Shell preferred.&nbsp;</li><li>Demonstrated knowledge of RESTFUL API concepts and JSON formats.&nbsp;</li><li>Working knowledge of application development architectures, web deployment methodologies and mobile technologies.&nbsp;</li><li>This position requires a wide breadth of skills and experience in-order to develop new application hosting platforms and strategies.</li><li>Experience with IT Automation products such as Terraform, Chef, etc.&nbsp;</li><li>Experience with VMWare ESX and vCenter.&nbsp;</li><li>Experience with network load balancers (SLB, GSLB). * Experience with Google Cloud technologies GCE and/or GKE. Supervisory&nbsp;</li></ul>
